content:
## MARKET OVERVIEW

**1. What is the Current Market Regime?**
RISK-ON: low volatility (Vol: 23.9%) with mixed breadth (3/8 sectors positive), favoring cyclicals but participation is narrow.

**2. Which sectors are leading?**
Heavy Industry ABOVE TREND: EREGL (1W: +8.65% | 1M: +14.68%) ABOVE TREND, KRDMD (1W: +6.27% | 1M: +8.54%) ABOVE TREND. Banking & Finance ABOVE TREND: YKBNK (1W: +3.10% | 1M: +7.18%) ABOVE TREND, AKBNK (1W: +2.04% | 1M: +1.29%) ABOVE TREND. Energy & Chemicals ABOVE TREND: TRMET (1W: +8.21% | 1M: +10.98%) ABOVE TREND, TRALT (1W: +6.83% | 1M: +2.95%) ABOVE TREND.

**3. Which sectors are lagging?**
Technology & Telecom BELOW TREND: TCELL (1W: -5.70% | 1M: -1.28%) BELOW TREND, KONTR (1W: -6.28% | 1M: -6.19%) BELOW TREND. Construction & REIT BELOW TREND: TKFEN (1W: -13.69% | 1M: -5.21%) BELOW TREND; Retail & Food and Transportation remain weak and defensive.

## STOCK PERFORMANCE

**4. Top Performing Stocks?**
EREGL (1W: +8.65% | 1M: +14.68%) ABOVE TREND; TRMET (1W: +8.21% | 1M: +10.98%) ABOVE TREND; TRALT (1W: +6.83% | 1M: +2.95%) ABOVE TREND; KRDMD (1W: +6.27% | 1M: +8.54%) ABOVE TREND; YKBNK (1W: +3.10% | 1M: +7.18%) ABOVE TREND.

**5. Worst Performing Stocks?**
TKFEN (1W: -13.69% | 1M: -5.21%) BELOW TREND; HEKTS (1W: -7.88% | 1M: -10.06%) BELOW TREND; SOKM (1W: -7.21% | 1M: -1.54%) BELOW TREND; KCHOL (1W: -6.86% | 1M: -3.39%) BELOW TREND; KONTR (1W: -6.28% | 1M: -6.19%) BELOW TREND.

**6. Momentum Stocks?**
Up momentum: EREGL (1W: +8.65% | 1M: +14.68%) ABOVE TREND, TRMET (1W: +8.21% | 1M: +10.98%) ABOVE TREND. Down momentum: TKFEN (1W: -13.69% | 1M: -5.21%) BELOW TREND, HEKTS (1W: -7.88% | 1M: -10.06%) BELOW TREND, SOKM (1W: -7.21% | 1M: -1.54%) BELOW TREND.

## SECTOR OUTLOOK

**7. Banking Sector Outlook?**
Banking holding up and leading in the risk-on run but breadth is narrow; YKBNK (1W: +3.10% | 1M: +7.18%) ABOVE TREND, AKBNK (1W: +2.04% | 1M: +1.29%) ABOVE TREND, GARAN (1W: +1.52% | 1M: +1.52%) ABOVE TREND — selectively add on strength but watch 2W weakness in quant screens.

**8. Industrial Sector Outlook?**
Heavy Industry is the clear tactical winner: EREGL (1W: +8.65% | 1M: +14.68%) ABOVE TREND, KRDMD (1W: +6.27% | 1M: +8.54%) ABOVE TREND, ASELS (1W: +2.79% | 1M: +0.94%) ABOVE TREND — momentum favors cyclicals; watch FROTO (1W: -4.45% | 1M: +3.39%) CORRECTION for mean-reversion.

**9. Energy & Chemicals Outlook?**
Mixed but positive this week: TRMET (1W: +8.21% | 1M: +10.98%) ABOVE TREND, TRALT (1W: +6.83% | 1M: +2.95%) ABOVE TREND, SASA (1W: +2.07% | 1M: -5.00%) RECOVERY; monitor TUPRS (1W: -1.40% | 1M: -12.04%) BELOW TREND for continued weakness.

## PORTFOLIO STRATEGY

**10. Portfolio Recommendation?**
Risk-on tactical stance: overweight Heavy Industry and selective Banking names, add conviction longs in EREGL and TRMET; underweight/trim Retail, Tech and weak holdings like TKFEN and KONTR while keeping stops tight given narrow breadth.

## NEXT WEEK OUTLOOK

**11. Stocks to Watch Next Week?**
EREGL (1W: +8.65% | 1M: +14.68%) ABOVE TREND for momentum continuation; TRMET (1W: +8.21% | 1M: +10.98%) ABOVE TREND on commodity sensitivity; TKFEN (1W: -13.69% | 1M: -5.21%) BELOW TREND as a watchlist for oversold bounce; TCELL (1W: -5.70% | 1M: -1.28%) BELOW TREND for any catalyst-driven reversal.

**12. Sectors to Watch Next Week?**
Heavy Industry and Banking for upside leadership; Energy & Chemicals for catalyst-driven moves and divergences between names.

**13. Key Levels & Triggers?**
Watch XU100 reaction to 20-day trend and weekly close — bullish continuation requires holds above the short-term moving average and rising breadth; key catalysts: domestic CPI and CBRT commentary, USD/TRY direction, Q1 earnings from banks and cyclicals, and global risk sentiment.

## EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
Low-volatility RISK-ON with narrow participation: Heavy Industry and select Banks lead while Tech, Retail and Construction lag. Trade tactically long EREGL/TRMET and selective banks, trim weak retail/tech holdings and monitor macro catalysts (CBRT, CPI, USD/TRY) for regime shift.
